contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Paint Rock, Alabama |settlement_type = [[Town]] |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_seal = |image_map = Jackson_County_Alabama_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Paint_Rock_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location in [[Jackson County, Alabama|Jackson County]] and the state of [[Alabama]] |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |coordinates_region = US-AL |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[US state|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[List of counties in Alabama|County]] |subdivision_name = [[United States]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Alabama]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Jackson County, Alabama|Jackson]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 1.2 |area_total_sq_mi = 0.4 |area_land_km2 = 1.2 |area_land_sq_mi = 0.4 |area_water_km2 = 0 |area_water_sq_mi = 0 |elevation_ft = 610 |elevation_m = 186 |population_as_of = 2000 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 185 |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = 154.2 |population_density_sq_mi = 462.5 |timezone = [[Central Time Zone (North America)|Central (CST)]] |utc_offset = -6 |latd = 34 |latm = 39 |lats = 37 |latNS = N |longd = 86 |longm = 19 |longs = 41 |longEW = W |timezone_DST = CDT |utc_offset_DST = -5 |postal_code_type = [[ZIP code]] |postal_code = 35764 |area_code = [[Area code 256|256]] |blank_name = [[Federal Information Processing Standard|FIPS code]] |blank_info = 01-57696 |blank1_name = [[Geographic Names Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = 0154485 |footnotes = |website = }} '''Paint Rock''' is a town in [[Jackson County, Alabama|Jackson County]], [[Alabama]], [[United States]], along the [[Paint Rock River]], and is included in the [[Huntsville-Decatur Combined Statistical Area]]. As of the 2000 census, the population of the town is 185. This was the location where the [[Scottsboro Boys]] were arrested. ==Geography== Paint Rock is located at {{Coord|34|39|37|N|86|19|41|W|type:city}} (34.660172, -86.328018){{GR|1}}. According to the [[U.S. Census Bureau]], the town has a total area of {{convert|0.4|sqmi|km2}}, all land. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 185 people, 81 households, and 57 families residing in the town. The [[population density]] was 415.9 people per square mile (162.3/km²). There were 94 housing units at an average density of 211.3 per square mile (82.5/km²). The racial makeup of the town was 96.76% [[Race (United States Census)|White]], 0.54% [[Race (United States Census)|Native American]], and 2.70% from two or more races. There were 81 households out of which 27.2% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 54.3% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 11.1% had a female householder with no husband present, and 29.6% were non-families. 29.6% of all households were made up of individuals and 13.6% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.28 and the average family size was 2.77. In the town the population was spread out with 18.4% under the age of 18, 14.1% from 18 to 24, 24.9% from 25 to 44, 24.9% from 45 to 64, and 17.8% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 38 years. For every 100 females there were 92.7 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 98.7 males. The median income for a household in the town was $35,521, and the median income for a family was $36,875. Males had a median income of $28,750 versus $16,719 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the town was $15,551. About 8.3% of families and 10.8% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including none of those under the age of eighteen or sixty five or over. == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://bamarides.com/2008/09/09/paint-rock-alabama-motorcycle-rides-in-alabama/ Motorcycle Ride Paint Rock] {{Coord|display=title|34.660172|-86.328018}} {{Jackson County, Alabama}} {{Huntsville-Decatur Metropolitan Area}} [[Category:Populated places in Jackson County, Alabama]] [[Category:Towns in Alabama]] [[Category:Huntsville–Decatur Combined Statistical Area]]
